s.text: (Clinton has certainly proven the corollary this statement implies to be true.)
(Clinton has certainly proven the corollary this statement implies to be true.)

A lengthy LAT front piece, the first in a three-part series, states that while restoring democracy and reforming politics and economics were top priorities during the last two decades in Latin America, the focus is now turning, necessarily, to eradicating police corruption.
Wouldn't a picture of the escapee make more sense?
' " NYT columnist Maureen Dowd says Gore's campaign is "already a matter of damage control."
